geom

Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • geom.Shape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Circle, KDOP, OBB, Point

    public abstract class Shape
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class for the representation of 2D shapes.
    Author:
    BRANGER Mathias, CROUZET Matthieu, MACE Quentin.

      • isCollideTo

        public abstract boolean isCollideTo(Shape shape)
        Indicate if a shape is collide to another.
        Parameters:
        shape - The other shape that should be tested for the collision.
        Returns:
        True if the two shapes collide, false if they don't.

      • isCollide

        public boolean isCollide(java.util.List<Shape> shapes)
        Indicate if a shape is collide to one shape in list of shapes.
        Parameters:
        shapes - The list of shapes that should be tested for the collision.
        Returns:
        True of the shape collide with one on the list.

      • isCollideGo

        public boolean isCollideGo(java.util.List<GameObject> go)
        Indicate if a shape is collide to one GameObject in list of shapes.
        Parameters:
        go - The list of GameObject that should be tested for the collision.
        Returns:
        True of the shape collide with one on the list.

        GameObject
